phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Vetto realized his true powers, and they were unbelievably immense.
Asta used the last of his strength and faced him.
Not giving up is my only weapon!
And I am never going to give up until I fulfill my wish!
No matter what!
His teammates were moved by his words and actions!
You did not give up, and that is why I am here.
My juniors are working hard.
That means I have to act like a proper senior.
I swear that we will not let you die!
Let us go!
The power of the spatial magic and your aura are gushing all over the place!
What?
The thread changed his trajectory...
I am going to defeat you...
with this weapon!
Despair vs. Hope
That was actually effective!
Now you have done it, human!
Thanks!
T-Talk about scary!
If we were even a second too late, we would have been done for!
Good work, little boy!
Keep it up!
No, wait!
I did not even do anything!
It is all thanks to you two!
Amazing...
These two are this powerful?
As I thought, I cannot heal.
Did he sever the magic current that enables self-healing?
The one weapon here that has a chance of defeating me... that anti-magic sword.
If I only had to deal with that unskilled brat, there would be no issue,
but those two are supporting him and giving him mobility.
The spatial magic is troublesome, but the real nuisance
is that woman's thread magic!
Her magic runs through this whole space,
interfering whenever and wherever she wants.
It cannot attack or bind me personally,
I can barely see it, and it is too thin for me to detect its magic.
That means I will not be able to read that brat's moves!
How amusing.
To think that three people who are worthless alone
could fight me by banding together...
It makes me sick.
Do not think that you have hope just because you have banded together, humans!
He is coming!
Let us go!
Got it!
Finral!
Got it!
Not yet, damn it!
He did it!
No!
That wound's too shallow!
We will not be able to defeat him just by scratching him like that!
This will make things even more dangerous, but...
We need to let the kid get even closer!
I am all for getting closer!
Bring it on!
I am not imagining it!
What the hell is this ridiculously huge and creepy magical power?
This is even more ridiculous than the ridiculous magical power I felt earlier!
We could say that it is now super ridiculous!
Shut up!
Stop saying stupid crap!
P-Please do not look at me!
More importantly, have your powers recovered at all?
YOU-Um, not at all yet.
I used all my powers against that steel ball lardbutt.
I cannot shoot even a single Reflect Ray now.
At this point...
Hey, domehead!
You are going to have to go ahead, and...
Munchy, munchy, munchy...
Are you seriously still eating at a time like this?
My spell from earlier to summon the Sleeping Sheep
One Hit
eats up my magic, so I am left starving.
Two Hit
Mega Hit
We cannot fight on such empty stomachs!
We all need to eat and recover as much magic as possible!
Well, I guess you have a point.
We should also eat and recover some magic.
O-Okay!
Take that!
The Magic Knights have not lost yet!
You can do it!
They are up against a crazy monster, but they still might have a chance!
That is it!
Keep it up!
Offense is the best defense!
Do not give him time to counterattack!
How dare you leave my son and grandchildren in so much pain?!
Please get revenge!
Beat him to a pulp!
Not bad...
Those guys never work together, but now, by working together,
they have surpassed their limits.
However...
It happened again.
He held his ground against their attack.
Could that bastard be...
I cannot let my guard down even for a second.
How long am I supposed to keep up with this tense situation?
Barely missed!
Get a grip!
This is no time for whining!
Asta is holding his own against that monster!
Compared to that, this pressure's nothing!
Finral!
Do you still have some magic left?
I-It is going down at an enormous rate, but I am still managing!
I mean, I spent all this time running away and not fighting,
so it works out in the end.
So it does not mean that our movements have gotten any slower...
Huh?
This is not good.
His timing is starting to match our attacks!
I guess it is about time...
Asta!
This is nothing.
One of his attacks just happened to graze me!
Let us do it again!
Hold it, kid!
Captain Yami?!
You should be the first one to know that
he did not just happen to graze you, since you are the one fighting him up close.
That bastard was purposely not attacking as much
and defending instead to better understand all of your habits.
Wh-What?
If you barge in unprepared...
He is definitely going to get you next time.
If you barge in unprepared...
He is definitely going to get you next time.
N-No...
As expected from the Black Swordsman.
That is why I am saving you for my main dish.
But what difference does knowing that fact make?
This situation is still filled with despair.
Insects, this next attack will be your last!
You do not get to decide that, you hairy gorilla!
You, too, Captain!
We will not know until we try!
I know, damn it!
Because I am a bazillion times stronger than you!
Then stop watching and come help us!
Really?
You are going to say that?
The thing that is bugging me the most?!
When I am barely able to keep my blood from boiling in this dumbass situation...
Hey, kid!
You need to calm down, too.
I did not say you could not attack him.
I am just saying you cannot keep doing the same thing.
He is going to kill you...
Unless you guys change!
Finral!
Vanessa!
Kid!
Yes, sir!
You know exactly what to do
in situations like this!
Right here, right now...
We are going to surpass our limits even more!
We are surpassing our limits and speeding things up!
Got it!
Asta!
A draw?
Not yet!
Let us keep on surpassing our limits!
Got it!
Of course!
Take that!
Little boy... when I see you fighting with your little body and no magic,
it gives me a courage that is frankly unlike me.
I had forgotten.
I did not want to remember...
how weak I was back in the Forest of Witches.
Hey, did you know that beyond this forest is a huge city,
and a lot of people who live there are not even witches?
Vanessa, you have told me that hundreds of times.
All the other witches are out playing, are not they?
Getting boyfriends and stuff.
Why do not you also escape from this cage and go out?
What?
I-I could never do that!
I cannot defy the Queen of Witches.
C-Come on, cheer up.
Do you want me to talk to the Queen of Witches for you?
That is impossible!
You are all dolls I created with my magic.
If I cannot do it, there is no way you could do it.
You are right.
Besides, this whole conversation is just you talking to yourself.
Hopefully you will be able to make some real friends someday.
That is impossible...
How could I?
I am always going to be stuck here.
I will never be free.
That was my fate.
I thought I did not have a choice.
But...
One day I realized that this was not fate.
I just lacked courage.
I was not wrong for choosing to leave the Forest of Witches and become a Black Bull.
Only you have the power to move the threads of fate!
Little boy, I will pull!
Just trust me and go!
I am counting on you, madam!
Curse you insects!
Come on, you two!
You are going way too fast!
I swear... this is the problem with hot-blooded people!
I have always been the guy with no motivation!
Finral...
What is that fragile and stunted spatial magic?
We of the House of Vaude are a family of attack spatial magic users that
have been Magic Knights for generations.
You cannot fight with magic like that.
But I do not want to be violent or have people be violent toward me.
You weakling!
Goodness!
Look at how much you managed to shave off!
You are so amazing, Langris!
A genius!
We will just have someone rebuild what he destroyed.
You do not have to worry about a thing, Langris.
Honestly...
Are not you ashamed to be outdone by your younger brother?
To think that the difference in your abilities was this great.
Langris is now the vice captain of the Golden Dawn.
And yet you are...
We are appointing Langris as the next head of the House of Vaude.
I doubt you have any objections.
Of course I do not.
I was just thinking that would be too much for me to handle myself.
Langris, take care of our family for me.
I do not take orders from you, Finral.
You bring shame upon the Vaude family!
You have got a point... but I am pretty popular with the ladies.
I ran away from my parents, my brother, my home, and reality.
Hey there, cuties!
Let us go have some tea.
There is a fancy cafe just around the corner.
You girls are so cute,
you are going to make me say things even sweeter than those sweets there.
In the midst of that, Asta, I met you, a kid with absolutely no magic.
It is not that you did not have enough...
You had nothing, but you faced yourself, kept fighting, and never gave up.
It is true that how I am now, I will never beat my brother.
But...
Say, Yami.
Why did you let me join your squad?
I can barely even fight.
So you can take me everywhere.
Huh?
Oh, right...
It is not like I can defeat any enemies with my magic.
You have probably got your own way of fighting, right?
Huh?
I am saying that battling does not just mean defeating enemies.
My own way of fighting...
I am not going to become the strongest.
But I will make the Black Bulls the strongest squad!
I had abandoned my own fight.
When I did, there were words I could not say anymore.
But now, I can say them!
Asta!
Believe in me!
Trust me and jump in!
Sorry, but I already believe in you 100 percent!
Not bad for insects!
But you must be nearing your limits.
If even one of you makes the smallest mistake, you will die instantly!
How long can you hold up under such extreme conditions?
Shut up, beast guy!
Until we beat you, of course!
Asta just told me that he believes in me 100 percent.
I knew that!
Otherwise, he could never fight using this ridiculous method!
Honestly, how can you trust a drunk woman
and a superficial wimp with your life?
If you believe in us so earnestly...
I see.
That is some magnificent concentration.
But how about your magic powers?
They will probably reach their limits soon.
The amount of magic we have...
That is the difference between myself and you insects!
H-He sure knows how to hit where it hurts.
My spatial holes are becoming smaller.
My threads are screaming.
I am almost out of magic, and the threads are about to break.
So what?!
I am going to believe in them both and win!
It is not just them.
Guess we got here in time.
Gauche!
Charmy!
And...
Grey.
It sounds like some terrible joke, but apparently, this is her true form.
What?!
P-Please do not look at me!
We can talk later.
Take this!
This is all the magic I have right now!
Mirror Magic: Reflect Refrain!
What is the matter, insects?
You think you will actually hit me just by attacking more?
Nah, I accomplished what I wanted.
Domehead!
Sleeping Sheep's...
One Hit!
One Hit
Two Hit!
Two Hit
Mega Hit!
Mega Hit!!
You are trying to make some kind of smokescreen?
Annoying little brats!
What?
Wh-What is going on?
I-It is my transformation magic!
I do not have much magic left, so some may not look exactly like him...
Bring it on!
Domehead!
Keep hitting until you run out of magic!
Lai-lai, sir!
You pesky insects!
Despair already!
Despair?
We do not have time for that!
Petit Clover!
Trinity
Trinity.
Listen carefully.
I am going to use my thread to change your direction!
Then, I will use my spatial magic to move you somewhere else!
But if we miss even once, you will be finished!
Are you ready?
Yeah!
All we can do is charge!
Here we go, Gordon!
Green light!
I believe in you two!
We can never betray that trust!
Green light...
Red light.
What?!
I cannot tell when Gordon's done saying, Green light, red light, at all.
I am so sorry, Asta.
He is just too strong.
This is so much fun.
You are it next, Asta.
I will make sure I get to you.
Oh, no.
I sense that my friends are in trouble.
I want to help you all.
Please stay safe.
I hope my feelings reach you all.
Black Clover, Page 49: Beyond Limits.
Page 49 Beyond Limits
My magic is becoming friends with anyone.
